name: Portgas.D.Ace
text: If you have 3 or less Life cards, this Character gains Rush. On Play: Give up to 1 rested DON!! card to your Leader. Then, return up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 5 or less to the owner's hand. If you do, your opponent may play up to 1 Character card with a cost of 4 or less from their hand.

effect.text: Give up to 1 rested DON!! card to your Leader. Then, return up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 5 or less to the owner's hand. If you do, your opponent may play up to 1 Character card with a cost of 4 or less from their hand.
